metadata.name: HODLERS Logo
metadata.description:
Behold, an artwork born of a non-artist artist's unbridled passion and a non-coder coder's fervent spirit. Its simplicity belies the profound symbolism it embodies - for we are Hodlers, steadfast and resolute. Each block that comprises the foundation of the H represents our unwavering commitment to the cause. And in turn, the H itself serves as the bedrock of our ecosystem, a powerful emblem of the Hodlers Collective's unwavering soul.

Or just a logo used for proof-of-verification (e.g. Twitter).
